column5: well another year has come and gone...I base my years on my fishing trips to bay wolf camp shiningtree, so I have to wait another year to go again   it was a tough year for fishing conditions couldn't be worst at times it was hard to get a bite, but when the fish turned on we did pretty well I played with the underwater camera and it worked well turns out there are lots of old logs on all the humps we fish  I did 3 ATV trips to back lakes  and that's always a blast, I did tip over the atv and broke the bracket that holds the folding boat, my buddy I had with me is over 65 and he survived the fall, so all is well and he trusted me to go on it again the next day  One morning I went down to the boat and noticed all my minnows were gone…thought maybe the door didn’t close right…yeah  Got more minnows  and went fishing Back for dinner and ready to go again  pulled the minnow bucket  out of the water and it felt real heavy I started to open the lid and something was looking out at me… I jumped like a school girl and trough the bucket back in the water. the guy with me thought I was nuts I took the paddle and pushed the minnow buckets lid open and a mink/weasel or what ever it was jumps out and swims off..I whacked the water beside him as he was swimming away and he never came back the rest of the week but he was well fed that day Saw some big cat tracks and wolf tracks and moose tracks but didn’t see any animals this year  But even with the wind all week the rain and the cold weather we had a good time                 now back to work on Monday.........................................crap
I always enjoy your annual report Terry. It sounds like this wasn't your favorite trip there, but I'm sure you had a great time overall judging from the photos. Thanks for posting..
Too bad the fishing wasn't what was expected, but it's always better than sitting around the house.  Wish I was where you were.

Terry, Awesome report!!! thank you sharing it with us/we... I look forward to your Shining tree report every year... and once again you did not disappoint!  Thanks again man...  Hey.. here is a suggestion... wanna go fishing?  Gerritt.
Nice pics Terry. It's tough when it's all over for the year, but with each day passing it gets that much closer.
Thanks for posting Terry, I think ya did alright.  And man, it could have been worse if that man eating weasel had of gnawed yer nose off or something.  Hehehe
Tipping over the atv, mink eating your minnows, that's just more quality memories for the rocking chair like my grandad used to say  . Great report!

Great report Terry.  Man I wish your friend had the video camera going when the mink scared you.  I love it when men scream like little school girls, ha ha ha!! TJ is the best at it tho  Some nice fish caught there.  Joey

Well it sounded like you had a great time terry,and the pics looked great,it sure is a pretty area up there ,with lots of wildlife & great fishing....too bad you weather wasnt the greatest,but us fishermen have to adapt to it right....cheers
Ah, a bad week of fishging is better than a week of work!!  Thats gods country up there.  great report.
Nice report! Thanks for sharing!
Great report Terry!  jumping like a school girl...at least it got your adrenaline up!! LOL.  Some great pics there and at least it will be a memorable trip.
nice report and pics
thanks all and I had a great time and looking forward to the next trip up there  you can't fight the weather.........oh...I said I jumped  back like a school girl ..not screamed like one.....HA HA
Still looks like an amazing trip, Terry. Finding that in my minnow pail would have scared the poop out of me.
Excellant report!It is absolutely gorgeous up there! Expensive but gorgeous. I may rent an apartment for a few months and stay up there one of these days. Probably be a heck of alot cheaper!
GREAT REPORT
Hey, I know that spot!  LOL.  Great report, Terry; I can't wait to be back there myself!
HeyA pal,welcome back from a safe trip. Nice fish and great photos.  Now lets get that new boat of yours slimed.LOL
Great report Terry and funny enough, you didn't mention a thing about all the "Terry clones" you took the pic of... no wonder you keep going back! HH
Great pictures Terry!
Well Terry some years are better than others, but either way just being there makes the whole trip worth wile.
